effect.Name: Division With Power
effect.description: Division With Power - Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by power
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Division With Power (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by power

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable decides which color the divider should be. When the option is off, the divisor is the base colors and when the option is on, the divisor is the blend colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility

parameter.name: Power
parameter.description: This variable sets the color power
